item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, April 25, 2025 at 11:15 AM UTC
item.description:

26. A Principled Approach to Querying Data – A Type-Safe Search DSL (77 points | 11 comments)

28. Microsoft subtracts C/C++ extension from VS Code forks (175 points | 210 comments)
